name: WhatsYourDamage
short_description:
WhatsYourDamage displays the calculated damage or healing of abilities with talents, gear and buffs included on your actionbar buttons. The addon also adds various statistics to the tooltips in your spellbook and on the actionbar.

This intended to carry on after the now defunct DrDamage. Note, this is not currently functioning, I'm working (albeit slowly) on this. Folks who wish to contribute/develop, please send me a PM and I will work with you.

This is intended to be a new iteration, but carrying on with the previous author credits, plus that of mine and anyone else contributing. It should be clear that if the original authors of the DrDamage addon come back and develop it, this mod will no longer be required.  (Though this is unlikely.)
